main.usage: Hero section background or side visual

general: Implement a 'Professional Light' theme inspired by Swiss design: high contrast, strong typography, ample whitespace.
Use 'Chivo' font for all headings to give an industrial/automotive feel. Use 'Inter' for body text.
The primary color is a deep slate (#0F172A) for trust, with a vibrant orange (#F97316) accent for actions.
Avoid generic gradients. Use subtle borders and shadows to define depth.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states that are clearly visible.
Use the 'Bento' grid layout for the category selection on the homepage.
For the 'Pièces Détachées' listing, use a dense, data-rich table or list view.
For vehicle listings (Cars, Motos), use a card-based layout with large images.
Implement a 'Seller Dashboard' that feels like a professional tool (dense, high contrast, clear metrics).

specific_pages.home: Hero section should focus on search. Use a large search bar with category dropdowns. Below, show the 5 main categories using the provided images in a bento grid.
specific_pages.listing: Sidebar for filters (sticky). Main content area for results. Use 'Skeleton' loading states.
specific_pages.product_detail: Two-column layout. Left: Image gallery (sticky). Right: Details, Price, Seller Info, 'Add to Cart' or 'Contact'.
specific_pages.dashboard: Sidebar navigation. Top stats cards. Recent listings table. Use 'Recharts' for any analytics.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where appropriate.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (e.g., p-8, p-12).
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Ensure all images have alt text for accessibility.
All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
